reportincident-dialog-additional-details: Add context that could be helpful for the reviewer (e.g. additional links).
reportincident-dialog-violator-disclaime: The Wikimedia Foundation will not voluntarily release {{GENDER:|your}} identity to the person {{GENDER:|you're}} reporting
reportincident-dialog-something-else-inp: Specify the behaviors not listed above.
reportincident-dialog-unacceptable-behav: {{SITENAME}} is a community where [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct#3_–_Unacceptable_behaviour|inappropriate behavior is not tolerated]] and is managed by the community of experienced users.
reportincident-dialog-record-for-statist: Pressing continue will make a [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy#How_We_Use_Information_We_Receive_From_You|private record]] of this incident for statistical purposes, and then guide {{GENDER:|you}} on what to do next. It will not submit a report.
reportincident-dialog-harassment-empty: {{GENDER:|You}} must select at least one behavior.
reportincident-dialog-something-else-emp: Please provide a short description of the behavior.
reportincident-dialog-internet-disconnec: Looks like {{GENDER:|you}} don't have internet connection. Please try re-submitting when {{GENDER:|your}} connection is back.
reportincident-dialog-server-error: Sorry, looks like our server is not responding. Please try re-submitting.
reportincident-dialog-generic-error: {{GENDER:|Your}} request could not be submitted due to an error. Please try re-submitting.
reportincident-unable-to-send: Unable to create incident report. If the issue persists, please email emergency@wikimedia.org with {{GENDER:|your}} incident report.
reportincident-notification-message-body:
Reporting user: $1
Reported user: $2
$3: $4

Threat type: $5
Details: $6
reportincident-emaildialog-content: We need {{GENDER:|your}} verified email address to provide updates on the report or follow up if necessary. Please add or verify {{GENDER:|your}} email address from {{GENDER:|your}} user account settings before filing a report.
reportincident-confirmedemail-required: A confirmed email address is required to submit an incident report.
reportincident-dialog-report-immediate-h: Report an immediate threat of harm to emergency team
reportincident-type-immediate-threat-phy: Intending to commit violence against an individual, harming oneself, or an act of mass violence
reportincident-unacceptable-behavior-foo: Inappropriate behavior is [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct#3_–_Unacceptable_behaviour|not tolerated]] on {{SITENAME}}, and is managed by the community of experienced users.
reportincident-physical-harm-infotext: A link to the incident {{GENDER:|you}} are reporting (including the reported user) and {{GENDER:|your}} own username and email address will be shared privately with the [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Threats_of_harm|Wikimedia Foundation emergency team]].
reportincident-physical-harm-footer: {{GENDER:|Your}} report is [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Privacy_policy#How_We_Use_Information_We_Receive_From_You|private]] and will be sent to the [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Threats_of_harm|Wikimedia Foundation emergency team]] for review.
reportincident-type-incident-required: Please select the type of incident
reportincident-behavior-required: Please select the type of unacceptable behavior
reportincident-threat-harm-required: "Threat of harm" option must be provided
reportincident-submit-emergency-dialog-t: Thank {{GENDER:|you}} for taking steps to make {{SITENAME}} more safe and inclusive
reportincident-submit-emergency-success: Report submitted for review. {{GENDER:|Your}} request will be looked into within 3 hours.
reportincident-submit-emergency-section-: If {{GENDER:|you}} are injured or in immediate danger, call {{GENDER:|your}} [[wikipedia:List_of_emergency_telephone_numbers|local emergency services]].
If {{GENDER:|you}} feel {{GENDER:|you}} may physically harm {{GENDER:|yourself}} or others, {{GENDER:|you}} can find a [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Mental_health_resources|list of support resources]].

{{GENDER:|Your}} report has been submitted to the [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Threats_of_harm|Wikimedia Foundation emergency team]]. The team monitors emergency reports 24/7, and {{GENDER:|your}} request will be looked into within 3 hours.
We will review it and determine whether the incident violates policies.
If {{GENDER:|you}} need to submit additional details, please email [mailto:emergency@wikimedia.org emergency@wikimedia.org].
reportincident-submit-behavior-notice: Admins can help with [[$1|urgent incidents and ongoing problems]] with user behavior.
reportincident-submit-behavior-section-s: [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct#3_–_Unacceptable_behaviour|Unacceptable behavior]] is managed by the community of experienced {{SITENAME}} users

The [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct|Universal Code of Conduct]] has [[Foundation:Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Universal_Code_of_Conduct/Enforcement_guidelines|enforcement guidelines]] that explain how inappropriate behavior should be resolved.

[[$1|Dispute resolution]] is often the first step for simple on-wiki issues. If {{GENDER:|you}} feel safe doing so, {{GENDER:|you}} can try talking to the person {{GENDER:|you}} are reporting, on their user talk page.
Admins can help with [[$1|urgent and ongoing incidents]].
If {{GENDER:|you}} are new, [[Special:Homepage|ask {{GENDER:|your}} mentor]] to guide {{GENDER:|you}} through the process.
All conversations on the wikis are public, please do not share personal information.
reportincident-submit-behavior-section-o: If {{GENDER:|you're}} unsure what to do, [[$1|please ask the community]] for help.
If the steps above did not help {{GENDER:|you}}, {{GENDER:|you}} can contact the [[meta:Special:MyLanguage/Wikimedia_Foundation/Contact_us|non-profit organization]] that hosts this website.
